meanings.definition: A type of metal loop with a spring-loaded gate used for securing ropes or attaching items.
meanings.sent1: I always use karabiners when I go rock climbing to keep me safe.
meanings.sent2: The hiker attached her water bottle to her backpack using karabiners.
meanings.sent3: The karabiners at the hardware store were having a party, swinging from the shelves.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the canyon like the clicking of karabiners.
meanings.sent5: The shiny karabiners gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: To fasten or secure with a karabiner.
meanings.sent1: He karabiners his keys to his belt loop so he won't lose them.
meanings.sent2: She always karabiners her backpack before starting the hike.
meanings.sent3: The magician karabinered the scarves together, creating a colorful chain.
meanings.sent4: His words karabinered her heart, securing his place in her affections.
meanings.sent5: The team karabinered their friendship, ensuring they would always have each other's backs.
